CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Value should be in JSON format and have the following attributes: label, apiName, statusValidationField, loqateRequest, and loqateResponse
e.g. [{"label" : "Field Label","apiName":"FieldAPIName","statusValidationField":"ValidationField__c","loqateRequest":"LoqatePropertyToBeRequested","loqateResponse":"LoqatePropertyToCheckValidity"},...]
CustomField.label: Field Mapping
